segments.text: The window above the sink provides such a stark contrast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden is serene and orderly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a neat path and well-kept bushes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, it's a completely different story.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is flowing freely, unchecked by anyone.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are engaged in their daring cookie adventure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman just keeps drying her dishes, completely oblivious to all of it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is filled with a strange, quiet tension.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Something is surely about to give.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost hear the crash of the stool, or a splash from a fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me feel quite nervous just watching.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The calm outside only highlights the chaos building within.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would step in and prevent an accident.
segments.speaker: PAR
